sections.title: Detecting Contact in FTC Robots
sections.content: Touch sensors are simple digital sensors that detect when they are pressed or released. They are useful for limit switches, bumpers, and detecting mechanism positions.

sections.title: Touch Sensor Facts
sections.subtitle: How they work
items: Digital input: pressed (true) or not pressed (false)
Can be used for safety stops
Great for detecting end of travel on arms/lifts

sections.title: Touch Sensor Example
Best Practices
sections.content: Always test touch sensors in code and check wiring for reliable operation.
